definition: to decrease/to lose/to damage/to harm/(coll.) to speak sarcastically/to deride/caustic/mean/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷨)
to waste/to spend/to consume/to squander/news/(coll.) to delay/to dilly-dally

sentences.english: Yes, testing is expensive, but production outages can be more so.
sentences.chinese: 是的，测试费用相当高昂，但生产损耗可能会更大。

sentences.english: I also like that the tech is supposed to be durable, reducing e-waste.
sentences.chinese: 另外，这项技术是可持续耐用的，能减少电损耗。

sentences.english: They are also particularly prone to learning cheap shaiya gold loss.
sentences.chinese: 他们也经常更容易产生学习损耗。

sentences.english: Wastage is now applied to Outpost construction platform blueprints.
sentences.chinese: 哨站建设研究蓝图应用时已计算损耗系数。

sentences.english: The instrument improved efficiency of inhaling oxygen, reduced infection and droped the amount of oxygen consumption down.
sentences.chinese: 增加吸氧效果，减少感染，大大地降低氧损耗量。

sentences.english: Contrast analyze have be done with different core material.
sentences.chinese: 针对不同的磁心材料进行了损耗对比分析。

sentences.english: Having the excellent electrical performances, low losses and a capacitance of a slight variation with both temperature and frequency.
sentences.chinese: 电性能优良，损耗小，电容量随温度和频率变化小。

sentences.english: You must allow for five per cent wastage in transit.
sentences.chinese: 在运输中要考虑到有百分之五的损耗量。

sentences.english: Heat losses from the reservoir by heat conduction cannot be prevented .
sentences.chinese: 热储通过热传导的热损耗是无法阻挡的。

sentences.english: Single-belt transportation, placidly and quickly , small friction, little waste.
sentences.chinese: 双皮带运膜，快速平稳，摩擦小，损耗少。

sentences.english: This thesis first builded up the loss model of inverter with different modulation methods.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先建立了逆变器不同调制方式下的损耗模型。

sentences.english: A much smaller power loss occurs in the cable when energy is transmitted at high voltage.
sentences.chinese: 用高压输送电能时，沿输电线的功率损耗小得多。

sentences.english: Lower line currents are associated with lower resistive losses (I2R) in the line.
sentences.chinese: 降低电流相当于降低线路上的电附性损耗。

sentences.english: Special depreciation represents deduction for wear and tear on an asset from a purely tax-based point of view.
sentences.chinese: 特殊折旧指一个资产基于税务观点的损耗。

sentences.english: All these energies may be interconverted without loss.
sentences.chinese: 各种能量可以无损耗地互相转换。

sentences.english: This Web site is unavailable due to a planned maintenance outage .
sentences.chinese: 这个网站无法获得归结于计划的维护储运损耗。

definition: to exhaust/to use up/to deplete/to drain
saving/to save/to use sparingly/to cut down on
to work/to operate/to revolve/to turn around
to waste/to spend/to consume/to squander/news/(coll.) to delay/to dilly-dally
